name: Space Breakout (Winchestrr)
description:
Have you ever wanted to take control of an epic spaceship? Fly through the space station, destroy incoming waves of enemies in dynamic and action-packed combat? Do you love graphics full of explosions and spectacular effects?

Well, we will not fully guarantee it, but we can assure you that with our game you will kill some time while sitting at work, studying or under a blanket with Monster Energy Drink in hand.

Features:

  • Endless gameplay! You can play nonstop until you're the last living human on Earth.
  • Two spaceships to choose from. Regardless of whether you're a fan of fast, dynamic gameplay or a more slow and aim-oriented gameplay, you will find your way with us!
  • A promise to fix all bugs someday soon.

Space Breakout is a game created by the students of Video Game Creation as a semester credit.
